title: Graff's Progression: The Fine Art of Becoming
description: Everything and everyone has a beginning. Graff, the antagonist from Skirting Mintaka, is no exception. His life as a by-the-rules fleet officer is changed by the death of a close friend, murdered by a secret collective of senior fleet officers, sending him on a course of vengeance and reshaping his personality into that of judge, jury and executioner.
author: Harold Eugene Covey Jr.
